books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Sue Monk Kidd
books.description: The relationship between a wealthy Charleston girl, Sarah Grimké, who will grow up to become a prominent abolitionist, and the slave she is given for her 11th birthday.
books.name: THE INVENTION OF WINGS

books.author: by Maya Banks
books.description: A widow and her late husband’s best friend encounter each other in a club devoted to the darker edges of desire.
books.name: LETTING GO

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW

books.author: by J. Lynn
books.description: As tragedy strikes a college campus, a star-crossed couple must decide what they are willing to risk to be together.
books.name: BE WITH ME

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: In this short story, the government assassin Will Robie is caught in the crossfire with Oliver Stone and the Camel Club.
books.name: BULLSEYE

books.author: by H. M. Ward
books.description: A glimpse into Sean Ferro’s mind; the Ferro Family erotic series continues.
books.name: THE ARRANGEMENT 13

books.author: by Anna Quindlen
books.description: An aging photographer rents a rural cottage and discovers sparks of creativity and desire.
books.name: STILL LIFE WITH BREAD CRUMBS

books.author: by Kristen Ashley
books.description: Emme Holmes catches the P.I. Jacob Decker off guard when she walks back into his life after nine years.
books.name: KALEIDOSCOPE

books.author: by Lora Leigh
books.description: A Lion Breed and enforcer uncharacteristically breaks the rules for a human woman; a novel of the Breeds.
books.name: RULE BREAKER

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by James Patterson and Emily Raymond
books.description: Sixteen-year-old Axi Moore invites her best friend, whom she secretly loves, on a cross-country road trip.
books.name: FIRST LOVE

books.author: by Marie Force
books.description: A website designer finds herself caught up in a family dispute over a country store; a Green Mountain romance.
books.name: ALL YOU NEED IS LOVE

books.author: by Joyce Maynard
books.description: One holiday weekend in New Hampshire, the lives of a single mother and her son are irrevocably changed when they show kindness to a stranger with a terrible secret. Originally published in 2009; now a movie.
books.name: LABOR DAY
